item.title: Sustainable Social Media Organization
item.description: Introduction: Sustainable Social Media Organizations We all have strengths and weaknesses. We can acquire expertise, but that means we ignore an infinite number of things in order to focus on a few things. There are always tradeoffs for every decision we make. And so my services have been requested by Mr. Grizwald. ok - since you seem to be branding as an HR consultant, what HR roles need to be filled by a self-sustaining social media presence/show?
